reviews.review:
Love this game and just can't get enough.  

The game just absolutely looks amazing.  The change in attitude from neutral to hostile adds a great touch to the game play.  Game mechanics are fun and interesting.  Anachronisms really make the game very interesting, unique and fun to play.  Characters are well developed and add to the storyline.

The extra DLCs are absolutely worth picking up.  Episode 1 is no where near as good as Infinite but Episode 2 is really on par with Infinite.  I found Episode 1 to be fairly buggy and fairly short but still worth the time.  Play style of Episode 2 is extremely different and really adds a nice touch to the play style.  Also very entertaining to replay and change your game style from defensive to offensive.

Bioshock Infinite is a frustrating game, in a very interesting way. It's absolutely beautiful, exciting, fresh and tense... but it's still mainly a shooter with a story wrapped around it. In terms of gameplay, this is a ten out of ten, no doubt: the controls and scenarios are perfect, and you WILL get absorbed in the story after you've found Elizabeth. 

The frustrating part is that, well, you need to like first person shooters to get anything out of it. The more story-focused gamers among us might tire of the fighting and get frustrated, leaving them unhappy with the game.

I'd recommend anyone giving it a shot, but I won't begrudge more peaceful players for their disdain.
Fantastic! One of the most enjoyable, thought-provoking experiences I have had playing a game in several years. Highly recommended.
Отличная игра! Атмосферная и с классным сюжетом!

Eines der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt habe!
Die Story ist spannend und sehr gut durchdacht, die Umgebung und das Ambiente sind der Wahnsinn!
Das gesamte Spiel wurde sehr schön designt mit wahnsinnig viel Liebe zum Detail.
Ein Spiel das nicht nur gut aussieht sondern auch mal wirklich heftig Story und Hintergrund hat, einfach uneingeschränkt zu empfehlen.
Exelente historia y jugabilidad lo recomiendo muchisimo :DD

Would you kindly just buy/play Bioshock Infinite already? IF YOU HAVE NOT PLAYED THE FIRST BIOSHOCK IT ISN'T REQUIRED BUT YOU WILL GET SO MUCH MORE OUT OF IT IF YOU HAVE! 

Seriously. Especially if you've played the first Bioshock. Just do it. You will thank yourself later. This game is an absolute delight and the story to it will have you confused at times but it all comes together. It will make you look back on the events that have happened and all of a sudden it just clicks. The story and characters are just amazing. The talk about making Elizabeth a central character that you care about and all that I thought in the beginning was going to be a bunch of typical developer speak as well but honestly.... I really started to care about Elizabeth. They style they went with, the voice work put into her, and especially the animation just make her not just a believable character but a believable person. 

Regardless of the story stuff holy crap the game is so much fun when everything is opened up and going on. The open areas where you can jump on the rails and everything is absolutely thrilling!

I also highly recommend the DLC Burial at Sea 1 and 2. They add so much more to it and they really tie up what's going on in a nice bow.

This game is fun for anyone who likes a deep storyline and fps games. It may seem like a mindless shooter on the outside, but on the inside it's rich with storyline. The game may get scary at times but it only makes the game better. Buy this game asap.
This game us a must have must play. From graphics to gameplay to the compelling story. You will fall in love with bioshock all over again.
Absolutely loved it, one of best narratives I have encountered in games allied with excellent gameplay and superb voice acting makes for a thoroughly enjoyable experience.
Шедевр!!! 10/10

I love the BioShock serioes and refuse to read any spoilers or anything else about games, other than the little blurb next to the screenshots and the screenshots themselves... I was completely suprised by this game, the story was great, graphics were fun and I really like Elizabeth.  Play the game to see how everything comes together!
Great story, very addictive and all around fun to play
Absolutely amazing game. Fun gameplay, great story and the artistic style is beautiful. It's a shame I got into this game far long after its release.
Купил игру на скидке, за 2 дня 6.5 часов наиграл, очень интересная игра!
So much fun
Absoulte masterpiece. If you enjoy playing a game with a variety of guns, abilities, and other powerups with an amazingly crafted storyline, this is the game for you! 10/10 must have.
Really interesting game. Haven't finished it yet but I'm enjoying it a lot. I really like story driven games like this.
Great game, highly recommended.
Exstremely good story

О,боже!
Это шедевр
10/10,но это только сюжет
Сам геймплей 2/10.Обычный рельсовый шутер.На дворе на момент выхода был 2013.Могли бы придумать что-то более интересное.Игра шедевр,но гемплей все портит,а сюжет на высоте.Графика очень хороша.(8/10).Саундрек отличный (10/10)
So far the game is pretty solid. Very fun very fast steampuck shooter.

BioShock Infinite is probably the best game i have ever played. The story line keeps me intrested in playing, With most games that dont have a very strong story line become boring after a while which causes the player to think, why did i buy this ? after a while of playing you just become hooked and cant get enough of the game. Would i recomend this? Hell yes, So go out buy the damn thing and stop reading these reviews because you will see how a bunch of creative minds can make something intreseting.

Замечательно передана атмосфера игры.
Очень даже неплохое музыкальное сопровождение.

Still unsupported by my PC, game crashes 5 mins. into the intro every time.

Love this game
Fantastic. I give it a Troy Baker/10. Still not as good as The Last of Us but it comes close.
This is one of the most creative and bold stories that I have ever experienced in a video game. If you loved the original Bioshock, then you will definitely love Bioshock Infinite!
holy ****. this game is amazing from start to finish. reccomend it even if you havent played the rest of the series, cause i didnt.
Geile Story

Pros:
+ Fun gameplay with plenty  ways to tackle each situation.
+ Big selection of weapons and powers (Vigors) that are all fun and satisfying to use.
+ Brilliant setting, with some great locations.
+ Great story with plenty of interesting characters all of which are voice acted perfectly.

Cons:
- Game doesn't last long and leaves you wanting more.
- While it is very nice, Columbia just doesn't come close to Rapture and it's atmosphere.

Verdict: 
Great game but I just don't feel it lives up to it's hype, still a must buy.

Buy the game and wipe away your boredom.

A meu ver, é o melhor jogo de todos os tempos, superior até a Half Life;  ele não é referência por seus gráficos mas sim por sua história...Com um um final interessantissímo.

Se você não sabe o que significa catarse, jogue Bioshock Infinite... isso se você jogar até o fim ;-)

Acho que, um dos maiores defeitos do jogo, é não possuir um multiplayer,... considerando isso, talvez, o deixe, um jogo menor que Half Life. E além disso , considero como outro defeito, o jogo ser um pouco cansativo e redundante, isso talvez seja por que é focado em campanha, isto, provavelmente é devido ao nivel de dificuldade um pouco superior ao dos jogos AAA casuais.
Beautiful graphics and very original surroundings but the plot has a lot of holes and it is hard to suspend disbelief.

Pros:
-Beautifully crafted game with a griping story. 
-High production value and excellent sound design.
-Highly recomended for any fan of the FPS genre that wants to experience a fast paced story that is wrapped in a beautiful story telling experience.

Cons:
-Main story is somewhat short, and can be beaten in a couple of play sessions.
Consigliatissimo!
semplicemente spettacolare
ein geiles spiel
finally found the time to finish this Fantastic game. and it punked me right to the end. This is a game that I wish I could forget, just so I could replay it 10/10
Absolutley fricken awesome. Enough said ..

별 기대없이 플레이했습니다만... 인피 엔딩보고 나니 전편도 플레이 하게 되더군요..

스토리는 워낙 많은 사람들이 극찬을 했고.. 그래픽도 그냥 하나의 예술작품입니다. 
메타 점수가 높은 것은 당연한듯 싶구요. 게임 자체의 재미도 괜찮습니다.
다만 사람마다 다르겠지만 엔딩 보고 나니 두번은 손이 안가더군요.

Рельсы, рельсы, шпалы, шпалы
Во-первых, стрелять здесь намного приятнее, чем в прошлых частях. Оружие звучит и отдает так, будто мы играем в какой-нибудь из лучших WWII-шутеров, а «вигоры», как теперь именуются способности, переключаются одной кнопкой, и совсем ненужных среди них нет. Мучительно выбирать, какими пожертвовать, а какие оставить, не придется — они все как на ладони. Во-вторых, Букер проворнее героев прошлых игр серии. Он может в бою прицепиться крюком к рельсе, прилететь с бешеной скоростью на балкон, а потом спрыгнуть кому-нибудь на голову что тот Бэтмен. Расставленные по аренам рельсы и крюки сильно добавляют динамики перестрелкам, которые здесь в большинстве своем продуманы чуть дальше, чем «целься, стреляй». Враги могут появиться сверху, из тумана, ворваться в дом или спрыгнуть с балкона; постоянно появляются мини-боссы и встряхивают игрока, заставляя резко сменить тактику.
norm

Great Bioshock game! I love the different atmosphere, floating city instead of underwater one! Yet, it still a guy, a girl and a brilliant quest. Great action, adventure, rpg, that is a mind f**k in the end!
Totall awesome. I almost decided to skip this game. Glad I didn't.
The game is just really cool, especially as the look is so much different from what you play usually and you just get into this absurd world and enjoy the graphic-art so much!
One of the best written stories in gaming, outstanding.
obra maestra una puta obra maestraaaaaaaaaa
Combat répétitif, on s'y perd un peu des fois mais sinon un environement superbe ! Sans oublier l'histoire et surtout la fin. Incontournable :)
Aamazing Game!

When you first walk out into columbia, and see the bright, vibrant world you will be playing in, you have a greater respect for the game and how it was made. This game isn't just gorgeous. The story of this game isn't like the rest. Its a huge twist that will land you on the google homepage typing frantically trying to figure out what it means. And this is what makes this game so good. You can tell they spent their time on this game and it was a baby to the developers. This game is very impressive and should be bought immediately. The only bad thing about this game is the sloppy gunplay. This leaves the game still very good, but ruins some parts of the game. I am giving this game a 9.3/10 because the gunplay isn't too good. This game isn't linear, you can backtrack and look around as you please. Enjoy this monumental game, because there may not be more like it!

I love steampunk. I love FPS games. I loved the original BioShock. I love games with amazing story. I love games with great game play. I love games with great graphics.
This has it all. One of the best games I have EVER played.
The Best Game ever !!!!!
BioShock best game ever!! Even if the DLC doesnt make that much sense
Un jeu remarquable par son imagination et son scénario profond et onirique. Malgrés une certaine répetition dans sa structure. En résumé un jeu indispensable.
L'un des meilleurs jeux au quel j'ai joué!!! Je ne l'oublirai jamais...
Вот это игра! Геймплей круть, сюжет круть, игра круть! Збс! Первая игра которая вызвала столько ощущений!

Graficamente muy buen juego, algunas texturas son decepcionantes (hojas planas de los arboles, frutas) pero por lo demás muy bien hecho. No espero un Bioshock 4 porque con este y sus DLC's uno se queda satisfecho.
Great story, great action, great game.
한편의 영화같은 스토리와 함께 뛰어난 색감과 매력적인 캐릭터등으로 절대 후회안할 게임입니다.

Juste magnifique, prenant, une immersion totale. Certainement mon jeu préféré. 
L'hsitoire est bien construite, et les personnages saisissant !

Probably my favorite game of 2013. Gorgeous visuals, engaging story and characters, and a vast amazing world to explore. I definitely recommend playing this game if you're a fan of the first BioShock, and if you have not played it yet, go play BioShock, then play BioShock Infinite. Don't forget to play the Burial At Sea expansions, they wrap up the current iteration of the franchise.
Just a great game

Nonostante Rapture avesse un'atmosfera stupenda, anche Columbia non è da meno.
Molto meglio di Bioshock 2, ma il primo rimarrà stilisticamente, almeno per me, il migliore.
Consigliato soprattutto se avete giocato ai primi due. Per quelli che, invece, non hanno giocato ai primi, lo consiglio lo stesso
dato che non bisogna conoscere il background storico degli altri.

Nowhere near as good as the circlejerking suggests. It does far outshine its predacessors, however. I realize it is weird to say that a game isn't that great but is better than one of the most celebrated games of all time, but the original Bioshock was really just kind of a mediocre game. The atmosphere failed to draw me in. The guns weren't anything new, in fact, I found the controls to be a bit clunky and unresponsive. It wasn't the least bit frightening like I was told to expect. Dead Space's atmosphere was far better all the way around in my opinion. 

tl;dr: Enjoyable, better than the original.
The story the grahics and the gameplay is AMAZING! I do recomend this game if you like story games.
Amazing story. Amazing characters. Amazng game...
Très bon Bioshock encore une fois. Mais trop court.

Loving every second!

It keeps you wanting to go further, and to see what happens next. The visuals are also great, the detail, colors and lighting are beautiful and the game runs very smooth. A good mix of quality and fun, basically what you can expect from such a great franchise.

All around good game, allows the story to come full circle and feels like a true addition to the Bioshock series.

Has a slightly different feel to the previous two Bioshock titles, enemies storming you in huge waves rather than the ability to single them out in small groups, probably due to the shield mechanic added to the game.

Overall a very good play and I would recommend it and all its DLC.

Шедевр, графика, сюжет
Великолепно 10/10
Amazing. Just amazing.

La merveille de l'année 2013.
Un univers incroyable et une bande son fantastique s'organisent autour d'un scénario bien travaillé. Le gameplay est agréable, Elizabeth est une très bonne innovation (fini les IA inutiles?) et le mode 1999 permet de rajouter la difficulté qui manque dans les autres modes de jeu.
Meilleur scénarion 2013-2014

First of all the second i built my PC this was the first game i wanted i had never played a single game in the series so i got all 3 in the triple pack so i played each BioShock, BioShock 2 and finally Infinite and i was so sad because i finished this great series of FANTASTIC GAMES I love all of these games but infinite wwas my first love the story the gameplay the interactions and the little secrets they add especially the Guitar and the soundtrack this game is beautiful take it from me play this series love this series and come back to me and we'll discuss jsut how great of a series it is im on my 3rd playthrough and i never get sick of it Elizabeth, Booker and Comstock they still fill me with all sorts of emotions 10/10

Незабываемый сюжет. Потрясающая графика. Захватывающий геймплей. Вкратце - Биошок Инфинит.
Ни одна игра так не затягивала меня, как эта. Такая задумка, идея... Эта прекрасная атмосфера, создать которую может только Биошок. Для меня эта игра - лучшая, и вряд ли я найду ей достойную замену.

Well polished and immersive. Exeptional writing, as per the bioshock franchise. Funny and touching in all the right ways. I think had more fun playing the main title than System Shock 2. 

Burial at sea episode 2 is an incredible masterpiece, so buy the season pass. Play BaS E2 in 1998 mode for full glory.
El mejor juego del 2013 para mi, con la mejor historia.

Geniales Spiel.
Habe alle drei Bioshock Teile gespielt, aber Infinite hat mir am besten gefallen.

Why are you even reading reviews? Buy this game! I got it when the price was $60 and I don't regret it. Great story, awesome combat and even better characters. I love Elizabeth and so will you! Go on, get it, play it and get blown away by it's secrets. It's worth the time, money and effort.

This is an amazing game

Just like the first and second Bioshock...

Not a masterpiece, but a decent shooter with a fleshed-out setting and an overall good experience.

Amazing story game play was a little rough at times and it seemed as if they forced the "skyhook" system into the game (never used it unless the game force me.)  A must play for anyone with the title "gamer".
Such a dreamy silgle player campaign, I had to beat it several times to get the story right. (Blow ur Mind!)

This game is surprisingly legit, even after all the hype. I wasn't a fan of the previous Bioshock games, however, this one has won me over. The follower mechanic is the best by far, rivalling The Last of Us in terms of having a decent companion.

10/10 solid game
if you say I haven't heard a good story for a long time, you really must play this game.

A solid 9-10 hours of flawless first person gameplay, followed by a mindblowing ending. It took me a couple of hours to comprehend what I'd just seen.

To top it off, it has one of the best female characters in a game to date.

Can't wait for the next instalment.

The gameplay is outstanding as the developers really delivered with this game. You'll still enjoy the romp even if the endings a little meh and predictable imho

 8/10
Engrossing and phantasmagorically addictive.

THIS GAME!! What can I say about this game,I love how intercate the details are,i enjoy how the story twist, very well thought out planned and drop dead mouthwatering GORGEOUS! i recomedn this for anyone,rather they like bioshock,or not. I wasnt the greates of fans with first 2,this one changed that though.
